document_data.mainbody: '''''Dungeon'' issue 63''' was released in January/February of 1997. It contained the following articles related to the [[Forgotten Realms]]:

Blood and Fire.Creatures:
:[[asp]] • [[giant ant lion]] • [[camel]] • [[cockatrice]] • [[dragonne]] • [[dune stalker]] • [[giant vulture]] • [[gynosphinx]] • [[hyena]] • [[roc]] • [[roper]] • [[scorpion]] • [[sleepwalker]] • [[stone giant]] • [[vulture]] • [[winged serpent]]
